query: SELECT id, code, title, description, file_type, url FROM assets WHERE file_type IN ('application/msword', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document', 'text/plain', 'application/pdf') ORDER BY code ASC LIMIT 20;
